item.description: This is an event put on by Great River Outfitters in Windsor, VT. They pay homage to Ullr, the god of snow with various activities from 1-6pm. It is free! They'll have a bonfire, munchies, sleigh rides (which may be led by dogs or horses, but it doesn't specify), a costume contest and parade, a drum circle, and you can bring your own wine. You might be able to bring your own snowshoes and walk around but I don't know, you should check with them first. Check out the schedule and details here: http://www.greatriver... I don't know if I can go, but I thought I'd throw it out there as a suggestion in case people didn't know about it.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Ullr - The God of Snow
